DOC.brief_summary: Distress monitoring is an important issue in cancer survivors. However, conventional distress screening is very difficult to perform. This study investigates the efficacy of wearable device as a tool of distress monitoring in breast cancer survivors.
DOC.brief_title: Development of Distress Management Algorithms Using Mobile Device Based Health Logs in Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: Stage 0III breast cancer Stage IV breast cancer Breast cancer recurrence or metastasis Severe medical illness
